item.title: UT-95 West Approaching UT-24
item.description: UT-95 west approaching UT-24 in Hanksville. Use UT-24 east for Green River; use UT-24 west for Richfield.

item.title: UT-95 West at UT-276
item.description: UT-95 west at UT-276 to Ticaboo. Continue west on UT-95 for Blanding.

item.title: End UT-261 North at UT-95
item.description: End UT-261 North at UT-95 in San Juan County. Turn left for UT-95 west to Lake Powell and Natural Bridges National Monument.

item.title: End UT-261 North at UT-95
item.description: End UT-261 North at UT-95 in San Juan County. The UT-95 shield is signed incorrectly as US-95.

item.title: End UT-261 North at UT-95
item.description: End UT-261 North at UT-95 in San Juan County. Turn right on UT-95 east for Blanding; left on UT-95 west for Fry Canyon. The UT-95 shield is signed incorrectly as US-95.

item.title: End UT-95 at UT-24
item.description: End UT-95 at UT-24 in Hanksville.

item.title: UT-95 West Approaching UT-24
item.description: UT-95 west approaching UT-24 in Hanksville. Use UT-24 east for Green River; use UT-24 west for Capitol Reef National Park and Richfield.

item.title: UT-95 West Approaching UT-24
item.description: UT-95 west approaching UT-24 in Hanksville. UT-24 west of Hanksville is designated the Capitol Reef Country Scenic Byway.

item.title: UT-95 West at UT-276
item.description: UT-95 west at UT-276 to Ticaboo. Continue west on UT-95 for Blanding.

item.title: UT-95 West Approaching UT-276
item.description: UT-95 west approaching UT-276 in Garfield County.

item.title: UT-95 West
item.description: UT-95 west in San Juan County. UT-95 is part of the Bicentennial-Trail of the Ancients Scenic Byway.

item.title: UT-95 West at UT-276 South
item.description: UT-95 west at UT-276 south in San Juan County.

item.title: UT-95 West At UT-276 South
item.description: UT-95 west at UT-276 south. Use UT-276 for access to Lake Powell, and Hanksville via the ferry. Continue west on UT-95 for Hanksville via the bridge at Hite and Fry Canyon. At the time this picture was taken, the UT-276 ferry was not running.

item.title: UT-95 West Approaching UT-276
item.description: UT-95 west approaching UT-276 in San Juan County.

item.title: UT-95 West at UT-275
item.description: UT-95 west at UT-275 north in San Juan County.

item.title: UT-95 West Approaching UT-275
item.description: UT-95 west approaching UT-275 north to Natural Bridges National Monument and Manti-La Sal Forest Elk Ridge Access. This is the entrance to Natural Bridges National Monument.

item.title: UT-95 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on UT-95 west to Natural Bridges National Monument, Lake Powell, Fry Canyon, and Hanksville.

item.title: UT-95 West at UT-261
item.description: UT-95 west at UT-261 south in San Juan County.

item.title: UT-95 West at UT-261
item.description: UT-95 west at UT-261 south to Mexican Hat. Continue west on UT-95 for Natural Bridges National Monument, Fry Canyon, Lake Powell, and Hanksville.

item.title: US-191 South at UT-95
item.description: US-191 south at UT-95 west, just south of Blanding.

item.title: US-191 South Approaching UT-95
item.description: US-191 south approaching UT-95 west to Natural Bridges National Monument, Lake Powell, and Capitol Reef National Park.

item.title: US-191 South Approaching UT-95
item.description: US-191 south approaching UT-95. UT-95 is part of the Trail of the Ancients Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-191 South Approaching UT-95
item.description: US-191 south approaching UT-95 west to Hanksville. Continue south on US-191 to Bluff. This sign is not typical for a junction between two state highways, in that it is not in all capitol letters, and there is not horizontal lines separating the cities.

item.title: End UT-95 East at US-191
item.description: End UT-95 East at US-191. Turn right for Bluff; left for Blanding and Monticello.

item.title: End UT-95 Approaching US-191
item.description: End UT-95 approaching US-191 in San Juan County.

item.title: UT-95 West at UT-261
item.description: UT-95 east at UT-261. Turn right for Mexican Hat; continue east towards Blanding.

item.title: UT-95 East Approaching UT-261
item.description: UT-95 East approaching UT-261 junction.

item.title: UT-95 East at UT-275
item.description: UT-95 east at UT-275 north to Natural Bridges National Monument.

item.title: UT-95 East Approaching UT-275
item.description: UT-95 East Approaching UT-275 north to Natural Bridges National Monument. Continue east on UT-95 for Blanding.

item.title: UT-95 East at UT-276
item.description: UT-95 east at UT-276 junction.

item.title: UT-95 East Approaching UT-276
item.description: UT-95 East approaching UT-276. Continue east on UT-95 for Mexican Hat and Blanding.

item.title: UT-95 East - San Juan County
item.description: Entering San Juan County on UT-95 east, crossing the Colorado River. This is the backwaters of Lake Powell, near Hite Marina.

item.title: UT-95 East - Colorado River
item.description: Colorado River crossing on UT-95 east. This is the backwaters of Lake Powell.

item.title: UT-95 East at UT-276
item.description: UT-95 east at UT-276 junction.

item.title: UT-95 East Approaching UT-276
item.description: UT-95 east approaching UT-276. Continue east on UT-275 for Hite Crossing, Lake Powell, and Blanding. Lake Powell can also be accessed via UT-276, and can be crossed via ferry.

item.title: UT-95 East Approaching UT-276
item.description: UT-95 east approaching UT-276. Turn right on UT-276 for Ticaboo; continue ahead on UT-95 for Blanding.

item.title: UT-24 East at UT-95
item.description: UT-24 east at UT-95 in Hanksville.

item.title: UT-24 East at UT-95
item.description: UT-24 east at UT-95. Turn left to continue east on UT-24 towards Green River. Continue ahead for UT-95 east towards Lake Powell.

item.title: UT-24 East at UT-95
item.description: UT-24 east approaching UT-95 in Hanksville. UT-95 is a Utah Scenic Byway.
